WebService.CouponWebSystem

Class CustomerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • WebService.CouponWebSystem.CustomerService

  • @Path(value="/customer")
public class CustomerService
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the customer web service which including all functionality required for customer operations
    Author:
    user

      This method aims to serve the administrator web service and make it easier to send error messages to a client in the scenario that an exception is thrown .
      void signOut()
      This is the sign out method it only set the session of the administrator to null on a purpose that no one else can take action without log in the system.
